text: Cheap produce, friendly staff and newly renovated. Maybe I'm not so picky but this is my go to store.

Oh mon dieu, mais franchement j'ai envie de dire "elle est où l'hygiène"?! A deux pas, il y a un autre intermarché très bien entretenu, mais alors celui-ci laisse à désirer?! ... ça manque d'hygiène clairement et pourtant j'y suis retournée 3 fois pour essayer de me dire que ça allait d'arranger. Mais, par exemple, les yaourts ont toujours l'air "réchauffé". Vous savez quand on prend un yaourt qui est resté longtemps hors du frigo, avec le pot tout mouillé d'humidité et tout mou. Et bien, c'est ce que j'ai trouvé dans cet intermarché. Comme s'ils coupaient les réfrégirateurs la nuit et que les yaourts passaient d'une température basse à une température ambiante à chaque fois. Beurk, non merci!

Update: they renovated, but the price problems continue and service is also a bit sketchy. 
So far, I've managed to get three items free as the scanned price was higher than the marked price. Exercise caution. Prices overall have gone up 40% since the reno.

Get your moldy veggies here! 

It's a practical place, but seriously, weed out your veggies when you fill up the bin. I don't need to see white moss everywhere. Other than that it's fine.
It's good because it's right net to my place but I find it over priced and the staff seem MISERABLE..

Consistently rotten produce brings down the rating significantly, but they are pretty well stocked with everything else. Convenience and good prices bump it up a bit. If you don't expect much from place you get your groceries, this is the place for you.

Stopped by this small grocery store to pick up some supplies for our Montreal stay.  All the basic grocery supplies are here.  Prices seemed fair for the area.  Shop was organized and neat.  Staff was courteous and helpful.  Overall, a good visit.  May stop in again.
